price: And to David We gave Solomon, an excellent and faithful slave who constantly turned [to Us].
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيۡمَٰنَۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡعَبۡدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
